sentence.text: It has been reported that positive regulation of gene expression downstream regulated gene 1 (DNA damage response, signal transduction by p53 class mediator) is related to the prognosis of non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC), and associated with c-Myc degradation in NSCLC cell lines.

entity.text: DNA damage response, signal transduction by p53 class mediator

sentence.text: We examined 184 lung adenocarcinomas and observed low expression of NDRG1 in adenocarcinoma in situ (AIS) and minimally invasive adenocarcinoma (regulation of signaling receptor activity), whereas high expression of NDRG1 was seen in invasive adenocarcinoma.
